entities.name: christmas
entities.description: The holiday being celebrated on the closed ward. (Excerpt: 'CHRISTMAS ON THE CLOSED WARD')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A person who is lying in bed, feeling desperate and hungry. (Excerpts: 'Harry opened his eyes', 'He doesn’t want to be on his own with me, Harry thought')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person who is trying to avoid being alone with Harry. (Excerpts: '“Harry,” said Ron’s voice', 'He doesn’t want to be on his own with me, Harry thought')

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A person who has made a statement that has affected the others. (Excerpt: 'Not after what he heard Moody say')

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are trying to avoid being alone with each other. (Excerpt: 'He doesn’t want to be on his own with me, Harry thought')
Harry's presence is influenced by Moody's statement. (Excerpt: 'Not after what he heard Moody say')
